my.pphr.cameraHRSpO2
Class CameraHRSpO2

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      my.pphr.cameraHRSpO2.CameraHRSpO2

public class CameraHRSpO2
extends Activity

CameraHRSpO2 class implements an application that can be used to detect heart rate (bpm) and hue by using Android smartphone camera.

Author:
ShiYang

surfacecallback

public SurfaceHolder.Callback surfacecallback
Called to hold preview of camera. It opens the camera and set the effect to none, set the preview size to the smallest and start the preview of camera.

preview

private PreviewCallback preview
Used to get preview frame from camera and process it. Extracts Red value and use it to detect heart rate. Display heart rate when peak of red value is found and hue value of each frame.

Constructor Detail

CameraHRSpO2

public CameraHRSpO2()
Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
Called when the activity is started by user. Loads the GUI, show dialog box that tells user how to use the app and assigns necessary textbox and toggle button to variables. Starts surfacecallback to preview camera' view.

onResume

public void onResume()
Called when the activity is resumed by user. Reset necessary variables and start new calculation.

onPause

public void onPause()
Called when user pauses the app. Stop camera preview and release the camera.

onToggleClicked

public void onToggleClicked(View v)
Function attaches to toggle button in GUI. Reset variables' value to default and start calculation on heart rate when press start. Stop calculation when press stop.

Parameters:
v -

isPeak

private boolean isPeak()
Function used to find peak in red value curve

Returns:
true if peak is found else false

decodeYUV420SPtoRedAvg

public static int decodeYUV420SPtoRedAvg(byte[] yuv420sp,
                                         int width,
                                         int height)
Function used to extract Red and Hue from camera preview frame

Parameters:
yuv420sp - preview frame in yuv format
width - width of preview frame
height - height of preview frame
Returns:
sum of red value in frame
